market_size.description: Addressable market size (not too small, not too competitive)

problem_urgency.description: How painful is the problem? Will customers pay to solve it?

founder_fit.description: Domain expertise, technical ability, distribution access

time_to_revenue.description: How quickly can you build MVP and get first paying customer?

churn_risk.description: How sticky is the product? Low churn = compounding growth

distribution_ease.description: Can you reach customers without expensive marketing?

competition_moat.description: Defensibility through network effects, data, niche, or execution

automation_potential.description: Can you run it with minimal human intervention?

exit_potential.description: Would strategic buyers acquire this? (bonus points)

results.recommendation: GO - Validate key assumptions quickly, then build if confirmed.
